Community Training and Collaboration Platform

Crosswired is a comprehensive and holistic platform that enables large organizations, associations, and movements to inspire their partners and volunteers to build flourishing
communities. The platform combines powerful training and collaboration tools and empowers communities to multiply and safely work together toward a common purpose.
Crosswired enables flourishing communities

Many organizations need a solution that enables their members, external partners, and inquirers to collaborate and train together without compromising privacy and security. With our unique insights, Crosswired addresses this challenge so that our customers can focus on their core business, seek growth, and deliver their services more efficiently together.   This is uniquely achieved through communities to help your organization flourish.
A platform that supports networks, associations and multiple organizations to collaborate securely, share resources and deliver training through a common trusted platform

Crosswired provides a beautiful UX out of the box that provides the features that are really needed, with a licensing model that provides the flexibility to engage external partners and a broader ecosystem.
Experienced with proven results across organizations

Flexible Licensing
Model
A highly competitive and flexible model that maximised external reach
Network and Training Communities
Use Crosswired to build your own network and training community where members and external guests may buy and sell content

Systems

Private Cloud Hosting
A rapid deployment solution of Liferay delivering tremendous value out of the box yet can be developed further according to your needs.
Trusted MSP

Top Level Security
From profile management, organization settings and personal encryption options, all hurdles have been overcome for your multi-national non-profit organization.
A full service community platform that:

1. Provides a safe place for community engagement.
    • Dashboard aggregating organization and community feeds, notifications,
      discussion boards and chats.
    • Global search for courses, communities, people, and files
    • Secure portal to integrate all your apps
    • Profiles - Full and granular  control of your profile visibility for peace of mind and privacy
  2. Equips and empowers your members, partners and communities.
    • Fully featured Community based Learning Management Solution
    • Learning Paths, Course catalog, course activities, blended learning and reporting.
    • Shared learning content marketplace
  3. Helps you tell your stories, inspire your partners, and facilitate collaboration
    • Posts and Timelines to share your story.
    •  Community registration and administration tools to simplify onboarding.
    • Newsletter subscriptions and bulk emailer integration for advertising.
  4. Enables efficient organizations
    • Organization structure administration tools to define your network and assign community leaders.
    • Consent management tools to enable compliance to privacy and community rules.
    • Define granular organization security standards, bandwidth, and storage constraints.
    • Opensource identity access management and second factor authentication.
    • White labelling / multi-domain
Company Profile

Khalibre was incorporated in 2010 in Singapore and Cambodia. We are trusted provider for not-for-profit organisations with a presence in more than 60 countries around the world and the provider of the Crosswired platform.
